actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that food producers who permit gleaning of their fields and nonprofit organizations which glean fields and distribute the resulting harvest to help alleviate hunger should be commended for their efforts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) food producers who permit gleaning of their fields and nonprofit organizations which glean fields and distribute the resulting harvest to help alleviate hunger should be commended for their efforts; and (2) State and local governments should be encouraged to offer tax and other incentives for such purposes.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that food producers who permit gleaning of their fields and nonprofit organizations which glean fields and distribute the resulting harvest to help alleviate hunger should be commended for their efforts, and for other purposes.
